name: Abrare
greetingText: I have prepared a small surprise for you, kntmna t3jbk <3 :)
wishText: May Allah fill your life with light, moments that feel like soft sunrises, and with blessings, just when your heart needs them. You deserve a year woven with joy, kindness, and surprises that make you smile without trying. Thank you for being a steady flame in my life warm, bright, and beautifully rare. May your path be eased,  and your days be wrapped in peace and love. Happy Birthday!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Abrare! I wish you along life full of happiness and success. May all your dreams come true!
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I have thought about it seriously for a long time
text4: I realized that I want to do something
outroText: I hope you like this little surprise 언니 ❤️✨! I made it with lots of love <3 And i hope you open this website much often
replayText: If you like it, you can watch it again by refreshing the page! Or Scroll down for more
